entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
